page.title: 15MR CYRIL PUTT-AN INTERVIEW
page.content: Mr Cyril Putt has lived in Raunds for sixty five years.He said:"The shoe trade industry has decreased to less than twenty five percent.Some of the industries have completely disappeared,eg factories like Adams Brothers which once had three hundred people,Grave Stokes,St.Crispins, Harrells,James Chambers Hill Builders, E.W Chambers and Owen Smiths have completely vanished.The lack of council houses has increased over the last twenty years.There have been more private houses in their place.The lack of council houses means there is a lack of back yards".We asked him if he prefered the old or the new houses,and he said that he prefered the old houses.When asked about the youth in Raunds he said"There's always been the good and bad children.They need some- where to keep them off the streets."
